被投诉用户：@ab50322(UID:47144声望:0)被投诉链接：投诉类型：回答投诉请求：观察投...

你给出的页面内，有如下叙述：
But communism abolishes the eternal truths, it abolishes religion, morality, instead of reshaping it, so it contradicts all historical developments to date.


At most, one could accuse the communists of introducing an official, open-minded women's community in the place of a hypocritically hidden one.


The Communists have also been accused of wanting to abolish the fatherland and nationality.
The workers have no fatherland. You can't take what they don't have from them.

原文确实提到了废除道德、民族、婚姻的企图，因此，此答主虽然只丢下一句指责，未提供具体论述，却无法明显构成误导，不违反规则。
